title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist in a Java file, the file is marked as unchanged even though it is being modified by code assist.
EB: When using code assist in a Java file, the file should remain marked as unchanged if no actual changes are made.
SR:
1. Open a Java file. 
2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call. 
3. For example, consider 'I' to be the cursor below: 
   Object o = anotherObject.method(I); 
4. Press Ctrl+Space to trigger code assist.
